title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Universal Mann ProVent 12mm-16mm Catch Can Kit for Crank Case 12mm-1/2″ / 16mm-5/8″ Hoses (incl. Nissan Patrol 2007-15) OS-PROV-10

content.rendered:
Universal Mann ProVent 12mm-16mm Oil Catch Can Kit suits:

ANY vehicle with 12mm (1/2) & 16mm (5/8″) Breather Hoses

Incl: Nissan Patrol 3.0L (from 2007-2015) CRD Common Rail Engines

With a 12mm Hose from the Crankcase and a 16mm Hose returning to the Air Intake.

Provent Kit Includes:

:: Provent Unit

:: Top & Bottom Hoses

:: Drain Kit

Download PDF Installation Instructions >

Genuine MANN+HUMMEL ProVent unit from Germany. Will stop sludge from collecting in your air intake & intercoolers !

Fitting Instructions: Choose the best location to position the ProVent unit. If unsure, you’ll find helpful information on the most 4wd forums.

Flow Direction: The Crankcase Outlet Hose is re-directed to the ProVent’s Top Inlet. The Provent’s Lower Outlet Hose is then connected to the Air intake.

(1) Work out where you are going to mount the ProVent in the Engine Bay.

(2) Slide the Silicone Reducers on to the inlet & outlet ports of the ProVent Unit.

(3) Decide whether to use the straight or elbow joiners to suit the unit’s engine bay location.

(4) Cut the 12mm and 16mm hoses to the required length and position sliders onto joiners.

Drain Kit:

Attach to lower outlet of the ProVent unit and secure with clamp provided (ensure drain cock is in the CLOSED position – *drain periodically).

Cut clear hose to desired length.

Servicing: The ProVent 200 element will need replacing after between 30-40k kms or when oil starts to seep from the top cap & the ProVent body.

Note: The 12mm hose is used on the dirty side from the top of the crank case & the 16mm hose is the return side from the ProVent back into the air intake !

Click to view Individual replacement parts

For an extra $22.00, get the Check Valve (helps to plumb the return line back in above the oil line.)
